issue.title: atlas_v3 model doesn't render in rviz

content.raw:
To me the problem seems to be that john's rviz and the ocu are ignoring the collada units. The meshes that are rendered tiny have a "centimeter" unit of "100" meters while the correctly rendered ones have a "centimeter" unit of "1" meters. Changing the unit in the collada files makes the mesh larger/smaller in Gazebo but keeps the same tiny scale in rviz so it seems like RViz and OCU just ignore the units while Gazebo doesn't.

So in order to keep compatibility all meshes in drcsim should be scaled to the same units.
